component.text: The role of the Internet Service Provider is changing and expanding. ISPs are transforming themselves to offer a wide range of services to their subscribers. Successful service providers are those that not only deliver broadband connectivity, but also provide superior user experiences to their customers. Network technicians and support team members are critical to an ISP creating a positive experience that builds customer loyalty. In this course, you will progress through the various functions and services provided by an ISP, as it prepares to upgrade a small business customer network. You will learn the knowledge and skills necessary to begin an exciting career in this rapidly growing field.
